results.title: STAT3 as a therapeutic target in the metformin-related treatment.
results.text_hl: Here, we reviewed in detail that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibits the progression of various diseases like @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@, @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune diseases@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Immunoglobulin_G4_Related_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077733 @@@hormone-related diseases@@@ by regulating multiple signaling pathways such as JAK/@GENE_STAT3 @GENE_6774 @@@STAT3@@@ and @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@/@GENE_STAT3 @GENE_6774 @@@STAT3@@@ signaling centered on @GENE_STAT3 @GENE_6774 @@@STAT3@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang W, Li D, Li B, Chu X, Kong B. STAT3 as a therapeutic target in the metformin-related treatment. Int Immunopharmacol. 2023 Mar;116():109770. PMID: 36746021
